column3: I issue wares as rewards to those who contribute to the reconstruction effort. My apologies, but I am afraid I cannot accept gil.
Welcome, my <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>lord</If>! You honor us with not only your presence, but your contribution besides!
Now, you may have heard that contributing to the cause earns you skybuilders' scrips. These may be brought here to be exchanged for a selection of wares.
In order to attract ever more contributors, we endeavor to expand the range of items offered.
We endeavor to expand the range of items offered, that we might continue to attract contributors, even now that the reconstruction effort itself has been completed.
Aside from donating items, you may also earn scrips by participating in concerted works. Have you been informed about these, perchance?
In which case, I urge you to have the details from Chief Foreman Augebert. Meanwhile, I shall look forward to exchanging many scrips for you!
Aside from donating items, you may also earn scrips by bringing materials gathered in the Diadem. Have you been informed about these, perchance?
If not, Flotpassant will be able to furnish you with the particulars. Meanwhile, I shall look forward to exchanging many scrips for you!
